an3.21:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an3.21:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu.
an3.21:1.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ samiddhaṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
an3.21:2.1: “Tayome, āvuso samiddha, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:2.4: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:2.5: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:3.1: “Tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:3.4: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:3.5: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
an3.21:4.2: “tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:4.5: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:4.6: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:5.1: “Tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:5.4: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:5.5: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an3.21:6.2: “tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:6.5: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:6.6: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:7.1: “Tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:7.4: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.21:7.5: Imesaṃ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto, ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:8.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantañca samiddhaṃ āyasmantañca mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
an3.21:8.2: “byākataṃ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
an3.21:8.3: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocessāma.
an3.21:8.4: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā”ti.
an3.21:8.5: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an3.21:8.6: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
an3.21:8.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto yāvatako ahosi āyasmatā ca samiddhena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
an3.21:9.2: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:9.3: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:10.1: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
an3.21:10.2: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:10.3: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:11.1: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
an3.21:11.2: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:11.3: Ṭhānañhetaṃ, sāriputta, vijjati yvāyaṃ puggalo diṭṭhippatto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno, yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā, yo cāyaṃ puggalo kāyasakkhī sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:12.1: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṃ ekaṃsena byākātuṃ:
an3.21:12.2: ‘ayaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’”ti.
